Reviews.Title: cheat sheet
Reviews.Author: Ken Sair
Reviews.Content: Small and easy to carry. Print is very small and the overall effect is very 'busy'. It did not have enough 'shooting hints' as I expected. More of a condensed owners manual. Should have contained more info re camera settings for various conditions ie sunlight-cloudy-sports-portraits etc. Still, it will be helpful and way better than carrying the manual.

Reviews.Title: Packed with info
Reviews.Author: SCMorrow
Reviews.Content: Not since Latin class have I needed a detailed cheat sheet like this so badly. It's packed with info for so many 60D camera settings and adjustments. It's a great buy and will help you get comfortable with your camera. I take it with me every time I shoot.

Reviews.Title: Did not get it
Reviews.Author: Dman
Reviews.Content: I did not get it. I sent emails and was told they put a trace on it and that was it. If I ever get product I can update my review.

ProductInfo.Features: PhotoBert Photo CheatSheet for Canon EOS 60D Digital SLR Camera
ProductInfo.Name: PhotoBert Photo CheatSheet for Canon EOS 60D Digital SLR Camera
